name: Flight Simulator (polygonvariable)
description:
Fly across the world.

Flight Simulator is a light weight game in which you can travel across the globe. Want to go to custom location ? Just add the coordinate !

Controls:

  • W: Increase Speed
  • Left Alt: Show Mouse Cursor
  • Esc: Pause

Tips:

  • Change time in World Settings option.
  • You can change coordinates in menu.

Tested On:

  • RAM: 16 GB
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8 Graphics
  • Space Required: 450 MB

Install Instruction:

  • Extract the WindowsNoEditor.rar and
  • Run FlightSimulator.exe
  • Enjoy !!!
